result.reason: Panel layout save/restore infrastructure exists but isn't fully wired — custom panels and their connections aren't persisted across sessions
result.approach: Wire existing SaveLayout/LoadLayoutByName into app shutdown/startup cycle so custom-named ConnectionWindows and their connection assignments persist in pnlLayout.xml via GetPersistString override; ensure panel chooser dialog shows previously-saved panel names

attempts.raw_output:
Based on the issue details and codebase analysis, the infrastructure for named panel layout save/restore already exists (`DockPanelLayoutSaver.SaveLayout`, `DockPanelLayoutLoader.LoadLayoutByName`, `GetContentFromPersistString` with ConnectionWindow persist strings). The gap is that the default save-on-exit doesn't persist custom panel names and connection assignments, and the UI doesn't offer previously-created panel names on restart.
